nodes.text: The Core Founders were a group of twenty-two worlds, all in the Core, which had founded the Galactic Republic. Alderaan was a member of the group. The Avenue of the Core Founders in front of the Galactic Senate Building on Coruscant was named after the group and lined with statues representing the worlds. The Unity Arc built for the Republic Fair on Valo was composed of twenty-two floating spheres representing the Core Founders.
